title: Been Disconnecting mid game since new patch
body: I will be playing any game mode and just random moments I will get the reconnecting attempt mid game or I will disconnect and reconnect or my champion freezes, I don't know what is causing the problem but it starting happening after the new patch, if any ideas of how to fix this I would greatly appreciate it.

replies.body: all my mates are having the same issue and and only after patch 7.4 Ive been doing everything including changing the modem still just freezes then reconnects but you can move for like 3 secs after you reconnect causing us to die please help us we love this game to much

Patches only change local files inside your League directory, so it's **very unlikely** that the patch impacted your connectivity to our game servers. The symptoms you're running into are fairly common for players that are experiencing an *unstable connection* to our game servers. This could be for a number of reasons, however, our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions for this, so I'd like you to give those a go.

Let me know if this caused any change.

You must forgive us for this assumption when the only thing that changed from running smoothly, to getting frequent, random, disconnects, is the patch.
I too, haven't had a problem for over 50 straight games-ish, then, patch hits, and suddenly I am getting 2-3 disconnects every game. And yet somehow, all of the webpages I open up to test my connection is perfectly fine; even streaming 1080p videos are instantaneous. (I am NOT streaming while playing).
